sentence.Network_en: Over the years he's demonstrated a certain prescience in foreign affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些年来，他已经在外交事务方面表现出一定的预见性。

sentence.Network_en: Experience has shown the wisdom of his prescience
sentence.Network_cn: 历史经验证明了他的先见之明。

sentence.Network_en: Combat Prescience. You gain a + 2 insight bonus on your attack roll.
sentence.Network_cn: 战斗远见: 你的攻击掷骰得到+2洞察加值.

如果一个研究场按它自己的方式正在变成科学，我们可以称这样的研究场为前科学或原始科学(prescience or protoscience)。严格地讲…

entry.tran: 预知的；预见性的；能预见未来的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something was prescient, you mean that they were able to know or predict what was going to happen in the future.

example.ex: ...'Bob Roberts', an eerily prescient comedy about a populist multimillionaire political candidate.
example.tran: 《天生赢家》，一部关于一位拥有数千万家财的平民党政治候选人的怪诞预言性喜剧

means.word_mean: 1. the power to foresee the future

auth_sentence.content: Prescience is rare enough in the private sector.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prescience is rare enough in the private sector.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prescience is rare enough in the private sector.

auth_sentence.content: She had a strange prescience, an intimation of something yet to come.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had a strange prescience, an intimation of something yet to come.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had a strange prescience, an intimation of something yet to come.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: You write of Orwell's prescience but attribute it to the wrong group.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家
